name: BugAttack
description:
GameJam game

MiniGame

Avoid bugs and try to reach the snake. Black bugs follow the player while the red ones just roll down.

Note!

Don't change the resolution from the options if you're playing the webGL version. Full screen is preferred

Movement:

- Use arrow keys or wasd to move

- Use Space to jump

-Best performance on resolution 1920x1080

-Menu video won't play in webgl 

Game by:

- Pinja Toivola (level design)

- Pauliina Peltala (graphic design)

- Joonas Sarin (code)
